verbs.description: [ARG1: australian banks] [V: slammed] [ARG2: for greed] [ARGM-LOC: in industry ‘ day of shame’] [ARGM-LOC: australia long - running inquiry into its financial industry] lambasted a runaway culture of greed and poor behavior but stopped short of recommending any penalties sending bank shares rallying
